bio.title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer | GSAP Enthusiast | Animations Specialist
bio.description: I'm a passionate software engineer with a deep love for solving complex problems and crafting efficient, user-friendly solutions. Currently, I'm working with modern web technologies like Next.js, Astro.js, Directus, and Tailwind CSS, utilizing Docker for containerization and Barba.js for smooth page transitions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Architect and maintain full-stack solutions using React, Next.js, Node.js, Directus, Shadcn UI, and TypeScript, supporting modern content workflows and responsive design.
responsibilities: Architect and maintain full-stack solutions using React, Next.js, Node.js, Directus, Shadcn UI, and TypeScript, supporting modern content workflows and responsive design
Leverage Docker for local development and containerized deployments, ensuring consistent environments across dev, staging, and production
Deploy and manage applications on AWS via Flightcontrol, optimizing infrastructure scalability, performance, and CI/CD reliability
Troubleshoot and resolve complex backend (Node.js) and frontend (React/Next.js) issues quickly and effectively, reducing downtime and improving developer velocity
Maintain and support multiple Directus CMS environments, delivering flexibility and stability for editorial and content operations
Continuously improve UI/UX through design-forward enhancements in React components and Next.js pages, contributing to better engagement and accessibility
Utilize agile development methodologies and ticket-based workflows to align with sprint goals and deliver value incrementally
Collaborate via GitHub for version control, code review, and CI/CD, promoting clean, modular code and team-wide best practices
Rapidly debug and test features in local environments, identifying issues early and iterating quickly
Implement infrastructure-as-code CI/CD pipelines using Pulumi and AWS, ensuring repeatable and reliable deployments

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Integral member of the CMS team, specializing in full-stack development with React, Next.js, and Node.js to deliver optimal functionality and user experience.
responsibilities: Integral member of the CMS team, specializing in full-stack development with React, Next.js, and Node.js to deliver optimal functionality and user experience
Troubleshoot and resolve backend (Node.js) and frontend (React/Next.js) issues efficiently to maintain application stability
Actively contribute to frontend enhancements that improve UI/UX, performance, and visual appeal
Utilize agile ticket management for streamlined, collaborative development
Debug and test features rapidly in local environments for efficient issue resolution
Proficient in React and Next.js for dynamic web applications, Node.js for backend logic, Directus for content management, and Shadcn UI for frontend component design

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Independent Full Stack Developer specializing in building high-performance React, Next.js, and Node.js applications and modern Jamstack websites.
responsibilities: Independent Full Stack Developer specializing in building high-performance React, Next.js, and Node.js applications and modern Jamstack websites
Design and develop applications and websites from scratch, ensuring technical excellence, scalability, and alignment with client goals
Implement cutting-edge animations and interactive features using modern JavaScript and React-based animation libraries to enhance user engagement
Collaborate closely with clients to understand their vision, delivering tailored full-stack solutions that balance design, performance, and maintainability
Stay current with emerging web technologies and frameworks to incorporate innovative features and future-proof architectures
Apply expertise across both frontend (React/Next.js) and backend (Node.js) technologies for complete, end-to-end solutions
Experienced in Jamstack architecture for fast, secure, and scalable sites, and in implementing various forms of interactivity to improve user satisfaction and retention

experience.title: Autonomous Vehicle Operator
experience.description: Autonomous Vehicle Operator at RocketPower, testing autonomous vehicles and ensuring their operational efficiency.
responsibilities: Autonomous Vehicle Operator at RocketPower, testing autonomous vehicles and ensuring their operational efficiency
Responsible for creating tickets for engineers based on vehicle performance and public feedback
Developed new routes for testing autonomy and gathered data on vehicle performance
Actively contributed to the improvement of autonomy algorithms by testing and providing feedback
Accumulated autonomy mileage to enhance the system's reliability and performance
Played a key role in refining autonomous vehicle technology through hands-on testing and feedback collection
